name: Meow Castle
description:
--- Introduction ---

Meow Castle is a game made in only 4 days for the UNC game jam.

A simple classic platformer where you have to get the keys to open the door.

--- CONTROLS ---

You can move left and right using A and D and jump using SPACE.

You can also restart the level by pressing R.

I hope you guys like it, and I would love to hear your feedback <3
